page.title: 01VILLAGE COASTAL LYTHE
page.content:
{Lythe Near Whitby, North Yorkshire.
Lythe is a pretty village on the North East coast of England.It is about 4 miles from Whitby and 26 miles from Middlesbrough.It is 1 mile away from the beach and sea at Sandsend.In the village, there is a Police House, a Nurse's House, a part-time Fire Station,a church,a school,and a village hall.There is also a General Store and Post Office and an antiques shop.Mobile services such as the Bank and the County Library visit the village each week.A blacksmith works at the Smithy for one day every 6 weeks.The land around Lythe is mainly grass farmland or deciduous woodland. On the cliff sides are the remains of alum and jet workings which are now overgrown.
